trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

action.name: Body Flop
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.
